main event: A United States Air Force pilot reported seeing a bright flash in the sky behind their aircraft while flying over England on March 4, 1952.
interesting points: The pilot was flying a R-29 jet bomber at an altitude of 17,500 feet when the incident occurred.
The flash was described as extremely bright.
The incident was reported in an official Project Blue Book document.
No further details about the size, shape, or movement of the object were provided in the report.
The report indicates the sighting was considered an 'unknown' by the Air Force at the time.
sighted object: a bright flash in the sky
